A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've watched this film twice in this past week. On first viewing\, it was disjointed and I didn't really like it. I've decided to give it a chance after reading the critics' review and also the 'backlash' by many fans. After watching it the second time\, it was so much better! I really enjoyed it on repeat viewing when I decided to watch with no expectations at all. Beautiful\, breathtaking scenes every few mins. A totally awesome experience..
